title: $900 / 2br - Cozy Two Bedroom apartment in Pilsen
posting_body: Great Location, Corner of 18th Street and Racine Avenue.
Updated listing with current photos.
Our tenant is moving at the end of the month and has agreed to let us show the apartment.
Please let us know if you would like to schedule a viewing.
Cozy Two bedroom apartment, hardwood floors.
Lots of natural light.
Facing 18th street, great view of the Chicago Skyline.
Kitchen, living room and two smaller bedrooms - one can be used as a walk-in closet or office space.
One bedroom has a closet, the other does not.
Rent is $900/month for one individual, utilities are separate.
Landlord pays for water and trash.
Tenant pays for heat and light.
Located in the Pilsen neighborhood.
Very close to the Loop, UIC, Orange Line, Blue Line, Pink Line and all expressways.
Located on the corner of 18th and Racine, in the heart of all the stores, restaurants & bars that 18th Street has to offer.
Very clean, brick building, secure apartment, long term tenants.
Owner is always available if you have any issues; building has two entrances and exits.
One year lease, one month rent and $400 Move In Fee due at signing.
Landlord will conduct a credit and background check.
Please contact us if you would like to stop by and see the apartment.
Thank you for looking.
This building is Smoke Free and No Pets are allowed.
